PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-06562020-09-20,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ISED
ActStatistics Act
SubjectCompensation rates for the persons employed under the Statistics Canada Act for activities related to the 2021 Census of Population Program
PrecisOrder setting the competitive rates of remuneration and allowance to be offered to Census workers, ensuring the Government of Canada is able to hire on a temporary basis the necessary workforce and fulfill its mandate to complete the 2021 Census.
AttachmentsAttachment
